Helper functions to create and filter igraph objects

manage_igraph_object.Rmd

codexplor offering functions to manage igraph object : turn an edgelist into an igraph object, filter some nodes accordingly to their indegrees or outdegrees, etc.

Once you have a network as the network of internal dependancies within a project computed by get_text_network_from_project (see the vignette of get_text_network_from_project)

  • Turn your Citations Network into a directed igraph network with 

      netig <- codexplor::get_igraph_from_df(net)

  • Once you have an igraph object, zoom on a precise function with 

    filter_net <- filter_igraph_egonetwork(netig, "an_interesting_function")

  • Turn it into an interactive networkD3 dataviz with 

        get_networkd3_from_igraph(filter_net)

  • And tweak the legend of the interactive networkD3 dataviz with

  • …

Developed by Clément Laverdet.
